mapper.insert: insert into member( member_id,member_pw, member_nickname, member_level, member_email, member_birth, member_item, member_gender )values( #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberLevel}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberItem}, #{memberGender} )
mapper.update: update member set member_id=#{memberId}, member_name=#{memberPw}, member_nickname=#{memberNickname}, member_level=#{memberLevel}, member_email=#{memberEmail}, member_birth=#{memberBirth}, member_item=#{memberItem}, member_gender=#{memberGender}
mapper.select: select attachment_no from member_image where member_id={memberId}
